channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 看：肯辛顿宫发布的一张威尔士王妃拥抱孩子的篡改图片引发了一系列阴谋论，人们质疑王室对王妃健康状况的透明度。
item.description:
Watch: An altered image released by Kensington Palace of the Princess of Wales hugging her children has provoked a barrage of conspiracy theories and questions about how transparent the royal family is about the princess’ health https://t.co/J5GG0ImWEE https://t.co/J5GG0ImWEE

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 纽约州西部一个自称是汉堡包发源地的小镇正在酝酿一项计划：在空中放一个巨型汉堡来吸引游客它将 "成为我们的象征"。
item.description:
A plan is cooking in a Western New York town that claims to be the birthplace of the hamburger: Put a giant burger in the sky to attract tourists. It would “be a symbol of who we are.” https://t.co/lxycZzZdPx https://t.co/lxycZzZdPx

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 拜登总统提出的预算案将把下一财年的联邦开支提高到 7.3 万亿美元，并提高对富人和大公司的税收
item.description:
President Biden’s proposed budget would boost federal spending to $7.3 trillion next fiscal year and raise taxes on wealthy people and large corporations https://t.co/TJdl8wAhow https://t.co/TJdl8wAhow

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：当哈马斯看到政治风向最终转向对其有利时，它为什么要暂停行动并放弃人质？@ElliotKaufman6写道：拜登的政治转向和对拉法的辩护迄今为止已将人质交易推到了风口浪尖。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Why would Hamas call time out and give up its hostages when it sees the political winds finally shifting in its favor? Biden’s political turn and defense of Rafah has so far pushed a hostage deal off the table, writes @ElliotKaufman6 https://t.co/KqvkD3DdRV

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在 Facebook Marketplace 上，有关 Meta 网上跳蚤市场的投诉不断增加，用户要么小心谨慎，要么上当受骗。
item.description:
On Facebook Marketplace, users tread with caution or get conned as complaints about Meta’s online flea market rise https://t.co/zgOXxmYtsI https://t.co/zgOXxmYtsI

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 以色列警察与一些试图在耶路撒冷最敏感的宗教场所参加斋月祈祷的穆斯林信徒发生冲突，标志着伊斯兰圣月的紧张开始
item.description:
Israeli police clashed with some Muslim worshipers trying to attend Ramadan prayers at Jerusalem’s most sensitive religious site, marking a tense start of the Islamic holy month https://t.co/5pIKhW6zIX https://t.co/5pIKhW6zIX

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: Reddit 正朝着股票发行的方向迈进，这可能是今年迄今为止美国最大的 IPO 之一。以下是这家社交媒体公司计划首次公开募股的一些重要信息。
item.description:
Reddit is moving toward a stock offering that could rank among the biggest U.S. IPOs so far this year. Here are some key facts about the social-media company's planned initial public offering. https://t.co/CFbbNrNvB9 https://t.co/CFbbNrNvB9

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 前法拉利车手费利佩-马萨（Felipe Massa）声称，F1官员掩盖了被称为 "撞车门"（Crashgate）的操纵比赛丑闻，使他失去了冠军头衔。他还要求赔偿 8000 多万美元。
item.description:
Former Ferrari driver Felipe Massa alleges that the fallout of a race-fixing scandal known as Crashgate was covered up by F1 officials and cost him a title. He is also seeking more than $80 million in damages. https://t.co/oYKNRIQTxy https://t.co/oYKNRIQTxy

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 中国一年一度的立法会议凸显了中国政府的言论与现实之间的差距正在日益扩大
item.description:
China’s annual legislative meetings have highlighted how the gap between Beijing’s words and reality is growing wider https://t.co/54BXu64hvs https://t.co/54BXu64hvs

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 街谈巷议比特币和 GameStop 成为头条新闻。但在印度却出现了更疯狂的投机狂热。
item.description:
Heard on the Street: Bitcoin and GameStop made headlines. But an even wilder speculative mania has emerged in India. https://t.co/HDPqbhgcZL https://t.co/HDPqbhgcZL

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 深夜节目主持人吉米-法伦（Jimmy Fallon）一直在等待谈论他的护肤程序。"从来没有人问过我，"他说。"我一直在求别人问我"
item.description:
Late-night host Jimmy Fallon has been waiting to talk about his skin care routine. “No one’s ever asked me,” he said. “I’ve been begging for someone to.” https://t.co/0kwW8tfou6 https://t.co/0kwW8tfou6

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 我们的首选电子阅读器是亚马逊 Kindle Kids（是的，即使是成人读者）。看看我们是如何通过审核和测试找到最值得购买的产品的。
item.description:
Our top choice for e-readers is the Amazon Kindle Kids (yes, even for adult readers). Check out how we vetted and tested to find the best ones to buy. https://t.co/8HJh1Y2tmU

— Buy Side from WSJ (@BuySideWSJ) March 3, 2024

item.title: Covid 改变了很多东西。其中包括：我们对工作的投入。我们不再像以前那样关心工作。
item.description:
Covid changed a lot of things. Among them: our devotion to our jobs. We don’t care nearly as much about work as we used to. https://t.co/b483ybf4jm https://t.co/b483ybf4jm

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 一架拉塔姆航空公司运营的波音 787 Dreamliner 客机在从悉尼飞往奥克兰的途中发生了所谓的技术故障，约 50 人接受了急救人员的治疗。
item.description:
Roughly 50 people were treated by first responders after a Latam-operated Boeing 787 Dreamliner experienced what the airline called a technical event while en route from Sydney to Auckland https://t.co/28cR1SlPuK https://t.co/28cR1SlPuK

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 比特币周一攀升至历史新高，因为另一个监管机构为更广泛的加密货币投资铺平了道路。比特币最近的交易价格超过了 72200 美元。
item.description:
Bitcoin climbed to a new record high Monday, as another regulator paved the way for broader investment into cryptocurrencies. Bitcoin recently traded above $72,200. https://t.co/OWaUNkzlMH https://t.co/OWaUNkzlMH

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 我们已经提前看到了 Z 世代管理的工作场所的模样。准备好迎接许多变化吧。
item.description:
We’re getting an early glimpse at what Gen Z-run workplaces will look like. Prepare for a lot of changes. https://t.co/h9hxnxYYmG https://t.co/h9hxnxYYmG

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 看：美国和中国在台湾问题上的冲突已成为国家安全界的一个常见讨论话题。一位军事战略家根据最近进行的战争游戏，阐述了台湾海峡潜在战争的结果。
item.description:
Watch: A conflict between the U.S. and China over Taiwan has become a commonplace discussion in the national security community. A military strategist lays out the outcome of a potential war in the Taiwan Strait based on recently conducted war games. https://t.co/981zb9ehPD

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在一架波音 737 飞机在飞行途中发生爆炸之前的几个月，该飞机在装配线上被需要修理的故障铆钉挤压了数周时间
item.description:
Months before a piece of a Boeing 737 blew out midflight the plane spent weeks shuffling down an assembly line with faulty rivets in need of repair https://t.co/uCVtWgDOnd https://t.co/uCVtWgDOnd

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 特斯拉的一个失误。一个慌乱的最后通话。赵安吉拉（Angela Chao）不幸遇难的故事。
item.description:
A mistake in a Tesla. A panicked final call. The story of the tragic error that killed Angela Chao. https://t.co/di9W6wlAWs https://t.co/di9W6wlAWs

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 在一些新型电动汽车中，12 伏蓄电池会反复意外损坏。这一问题令车主措手不及，并引发了网上投诉。这一问题还引发了至少两项监管调查。
item.description:
In some new electric-car models, the 12-volt batteries are dying repeatedly and unexpectedly. The issue has taken owners by surprise and led to complaints online. It also has prompted at least two regulatory probes. https://t.co/fV3ReBStLu https://t.co/fV3ReBStLu

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 观看："奥本海默》获得奥斯卡最佳影片，男主角西里安-墨菲获得最佳男主角，他上台领奖时全场起立鼓掌。"可怜的孩子》艾玛-斯通获得最佳女主角。
item.description:
Watch: "Oppenheimer" won best film at the Oscars, while its leading man, Cillian Murphy, won best actor, receiving a standing ovation as he took the stage to collect his award. “Poor Things” Emma Stone won best actress. https://t.co/WF8cJdlZAt https://t.co/WF8cJdlZAt

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 埃隆-马斯克的人工智能初创公司 xAI 将开源其聊天机器人 Grok，与 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 竞争。
item.description:
Elon Musk’s artificial-intelligence startup xAI will open-source Grok, its chatbot rival to OpenAI’s ChatGPT https://t.co/C7Ls60OD8M https://t.co/C7Ls60OD8M

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: Vanguard 表示，去年有创纪录比例的 401（k）账户持有人因财务紧急状况而提前从账户中提款
item.description:
A record share of 401(k) account holders took early withdrawals from their accounts last year for financial emergencies, Vanguard says https://t.co/Dkg3WnF8Dd https://t.co/Dkg3WnF8Dd

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 这听起来像科幻小说，但已有数十人在体内进行了基因编辑
item.description:
It sounds like science fiction, but dozens of people have had their genes edited inside their bodies https://t.co/vXW8xng7Jr https://t.co/vXW8xng7Jr

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 围绕着一座名为 One Brickell City Centre 的摩天大楼展开的挑战表明，迈阿密曾经热闹非凡的写字楼市场正开始降温
item.description:
The challenges swirling around a skyscraper known as One Brickell City Centre show how Miami’s once-sizzling office market is starting to cool https://t.co/oWN9wDfvpm https://t.co/oWN9wDfvpm

item.description:
The top U.S. military official in South Korea said his thinking has changed on deterring North Korea’s nuclear weapons https://t.co/ZEgUZQCjI3 https://t.co/ZEgUZQCjI3

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.title: 这张照片本应向世人保证，威尔士王妃凯瑟琳一切安好。结果适得其反。
item.description:
It was the photo that was supposed to reassure the world that all was well with Catherine, Princess of Wales. It backfired. https://t.co/S6jrx5loub https://t.co/S6jrx5loub

item.title: 数以万计的以色列技术工人被卷入与哈马斯的战斗。这正在伤害国民经济最重要的推动力之一。
item.description:
Tens of thousands of Israeli technology workers have been drawn into fighting Hamas. That is hurting one of the most important drivers of the national economy. https://t.co/aMCM2Pzz4v https://t.co/aMCM2Pzz4v

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 11, 2024

item.description:
Covid changed a lot of things. Among them: Our devotion to our jobs. We don’t care nearly as much about work as we used to. https://t.co/c5hWjVkRnA https://t.co/c5hWjVkRnA
